entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 4.
